name: Maze Painter (itch)
description:
Make your way through millions of mazes, and leave a trail as you go!

Use the Arrow keys to move, Z to go slow, and X to jump over small gaps. Use Ctrl + R, refresh the page, or some other shortcut to generate a new maze.

This project was made using a simplified version of the wave function collapse algorithm. It's more of a tech demo than anything else right now. My main goal going forward is to figure out how I can make it so the maze is continuous, and maybe do something about the awkward movement.
